markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Earthbinding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1866)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A weapon with this rune hums when touched to the ground.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour;  **Requirements** You critically hit a flying creature with the etched weapon; **Effect** The rune casts a DC 20 [_earthbind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=94) spell on the flying creature.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Earthbinding
